nodes.text: Sage of Uhnuhakka was a title held by Kiru Hali according to Collected Poems, Prayers, and Meditations on the Force, a compilation of writings on the Force edited by the Disciple of the Whills Kozem Pel.
The title Sage of Uhnuhakka was first used in the 2017 novel Guardians of the Whills, which was written by Greg Rucka.
